Original:
這間店跟我家在同一條路上，既然叫五二，顧名思義就是這條路的52號，基本上也是我每天都要經過的地方。最高評價就是普通而已，說不出有什麼好吃好喝的。

----------
【Petty Melt 烤牛肉吐司】
吐司很普通，牛肉是漢堡肉質地，整體頗普通。

【Grilled Cheese Sandwich 烤乳酪三明治】
普通到我甚至沒什麼感想。

【莫吉托】
覺得像喝一杯混酒而已，素材的風味都沒有融入。

【荔枝酒】
很甜，就這樣。
EN:
This shop is on the same way as my house. Since it is called 52, as the name suggests, it is No. 52 of this road, which is basically the place I want to pass every day.The highest evaluation is just ordinary, and there is no delicious and delicious one.

-----------
[Petty Melt grilled beef toast]
Toast is very ordinary. Beef is the quality of the burger, which is quite ordinary as a whole.

[Grilled Cheese Sandwich griling cheese sandwich]
It ’s so that I do n’t think about it.

【Mogito】
It feels like drinking a glass of mixed wine, and the flavor of the material has not merged.

【Lychee wine】
Very sweet, that's it.
